data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during LAMPHITRITE cruise from Coastal to Caribean started at 1775-09-10
Ship: L'Amphitrite, Voyage: Coastal - Caribean, 1st Observer: M. Le Comte de Grasse (Capitan)
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
